snippet.title: Five Nights at Freddy's - Upcoming Console Patch Update - Jan 2022
snippet.description:
Please don't forget to follow us on Youtube!

As of today Jan 12, 2022 we have submitted new patches for review for Five Nights at Freddy's to Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4/5 and Xbox One and S/X. The patch contains many bug fixes and optimizations but more importantly contains the new localization translations AND it now includes keyboard & mouse support for PS4/5 and Docked Nintendo Switch units! 

It's not a lot but we hope it will increase your #FNaF enjoyment of the amazing first Freddy title on console! We will keep you apprised of when it is becomes approved and scheduled for release!

FNaF 1 Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/five-nights-at-freddys-switch/
FNaF 1 PlayStation Store: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP5549-CUSA16870_00-FNAF100000000000/
FNaF 1 Xbox Store: https://www.xbox.com/en-us/games/store/Five-Nights-at-Freddys/9N5253J559LR 

#MadeWithFusion #Indiegames #Jumpscare #Horror
